employers.name: IBM
employers.title: Sr. UI Developer
employers.description: I am responsible for developing web sites and pages for a high profile client on very tight schedules in a multi-vendor environment. I work closely with vendors and our Java back end team to troubleshoot existing sites and pages to resolve issues in a timely fashion. As well as play a key role in site development for a redesigned fully responsive web application that integrates FTL, HTML, CSS/LESS, AngularJS, JSON/Ajax, Java, and Adobe CQ into one cohesive environment for optimal user experiences.

All work was designed with standards compliant code with emphasis on browser cross-compatibility, accessibility, and search engine optimization.
